name: Bike Shop
description: {userName} and {expertName} are currently in a bike shop in Chicago.
{userName} has come into the shop to ask for help with a bicycle repair.
{userName} does not have much money and is looking for a practical solution to his bike issue.

name: Event Photography
description: {userName} and {expertName} are currently both doing event photography at a concert.
{userName} is feeling like he's having trouble getting the shots he'd like, so is turning to {expertName} for assistance.
